title: A Level Sociology - Questionnaires
description: Liz looks at questionnaires for your A Level Sociology exam. In this episode, she will look at the types of questionnaires, the imposition problem and validity. Ideal for preparing for your A Level Sociology exam. For more info visit www.senecalearning.com
dc:creator: Seneca Learning Revision
